nodes.text: Daniel Falconer is a designer and writer from New Zealand. He is a founding member of The Star Wars Artists' Guild.

Daniel Falconer has worked for Weta Workshop Ltd. in Wellington, NZ since 1996 as a Conceptual Artist designing creatures, armor, weapons, costumes and props for various projects including Hercules; Xena; King Kong; The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe and The Lord of the Rings film trilogy.

He contributed interior illustrations to the Wizards of the Coast sourcebook Ultimate Adversaries (some of which were later republished in the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Saga Edition Core Rulebook) and has designed a number of Star Wars Miniatures. He had also contributed to The Clone Wars webcomics.
